channel.title: Comments on: REVIEW: Anakrid, Joyfear and Pos Load Nihilsurrealisme, Stereonucleosis

item.title: By: K.E. Revis
item.dc:creator: K.E. Revis
item.description: I still have copies of the Pos Load Nihilsurrealisme record if anyone needs one. Check out BXR RECORDS.
item.content:encoded: I still have copies of the Pos Load Nihilsurrealisme record if anyone needs one. Check out BXR RECORDS.

item.title: By: Boxer Music Store
item.dc:creator: Boxer Music Store
item.description: Excellent reviews of 2 very different and unique records from the same artist. Expect the unexpected with each Anakrid release.
item.content:encoded: Excellent reviews of 2 very different and unique records from the same artist. Expect the unexpected with each Anakrid release.

item.title: By: Black Horizons
item.dc:creator: Black Horizons
item.description: This LP is excellent, and is available from my distro along with other Anakrid releases, and plenty of other quality underground experimentation. Great review!
item.content:encoded: This LP is excellent, and is available from my distro along with other Anakrid releases, and plenty of other quality underground experimentation. Great review!
